original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Pathavīvagga
analyzed: pathavīvagga

original: 3. Tejaṅgapañha
analyzed: tejaṅgapañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘tejassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena tejassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, tejo tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṁ ḍahati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja tejaḥ tiṇa kaṭṭha sākhā palāsam ḍahati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ye te abbhantarā vā bāhirā vā kilesā iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanā, sabbe te ñāṇagginā ḍahitabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ye te abbhantarāḥ vā bāhirāḥ vā kilesāḥ iṭṭha aniṭṭha ārammaṇa anubhavanā sabbe te ñāṇa agginā ḍahitabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, tejassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja tejassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, tejo niddayo akāruṇiko;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja tejaḥ niddayaḥ akāruṇikaḥ

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbakilesesu kāruññānuddayā na kātabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sabba kilesesu kāruññā anuddayā na kātabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, tejassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja tejassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, tejo sītaṁ paṭihanati;
analyzed: punar capara mahā rāja tejaḥ sītam paṭihanati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vīriyasantāpatejaṁ abhijanetvā kilesā paṭihantabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena vīriya santāpa tejam abhijanetvā kilesā paṭihantabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, tejassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja tejassa tatiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, tejo anunayappaṭighavippamutto uṇhamabhijaneti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja tejaḥ anunaya ppaṭigha vippamuttaḥ uṇham abhijaneti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anunayappaṭighavippamuttena tejosamena cetasā viharitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena anunaya paṭigha vippamuttena tejo samena cetasā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, tejassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja tejassa catuttham aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, tejo andhakāraṁ vidhamitvā ālokaṁ dassayati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja tejaḥ andhakāram vidhamitvā ālokam dassayati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena avijjandhakāraṁ vidhamitvā ñāṇālokaṁ dassayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena avid jandhakāram vidhamitvā ñāṇa ālokam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, tejassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja tejassa pañcamaṃ aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena sakaṁ puttaṁ rāhulaṁ ovadantena—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sakam puttam rāhulam ovadantena

original: ‘Tejosamaṁ, rāhula, bhāvanaṁ bhāvehi.
analyzed: tejaḥ sama rāhula bhāvanam bhāvehi

original: Tejosamaṁ hi te, rāhula, bhāvanaṁ bhāvayato uppannā manāpāmanāpā phassā cittaṁ na pariyādāya ṭhassantī’”ti.
analyzed: tejaḥ samam hi te rāhula bhāvanam bhāvayataḥ uppannāḥ manāpa amanāpā phassā cittam na pariyādāya ṭhassanti iti

original: Tejaṅgapañho tatiyo.
analyzed: tejaṅgapañho tatiyo
